channel.title: ImperialPVP OP Factions! ImperialPVP.nn.pe:25584
channel.description:
Hello everyone! Come be a part of the Community of ImperialPVP a great Faction based server.
Currently a 24/7 lag free Server!
Not Whitelisted! Factions Gameplay! Kind & Loyal Staff!
Brand New Map! (Est. September 8th, 2014)
Hosted in UK & US!
300 Players Slots!
IP: ImperialPVP.nn.pe:25584.
Rules:
-No Hacked Clients
-No Spamming
-No Swearing/Racist Comments
-Respect Staff Members and Other Players
-Do not ask Staff Members for items or ranks
-No advertising
-Breaking the rules above will result in 12 hour ban!
Thankyou
~Owner Of ImperialPVP
